comments.author: Multidimensional

comments.text:
+Multidimensional Homestuck is a web comic created by Andre Hussie in 2009. 
It has over 10 000+ pages at this point, and is reaching it's end shortly 
from what we have word of. If you're interested in reading it for yourself 
I highly recommend checking it out; Though as a warning it is something 
that consumes your life and everything becomes horrible, you will cry, you 
will get angry at Hussie for everything he is making you feel with the 
comic but you will also enjoy it and not be able to stop reading, and then 
meet wonderful people that understand you because we are all crazy in our 
own way and understand each other. This is no joke either. The fandom is so 
crazy and wonderful, but at the same time horrific and terrible. 

Here is the link to the first Panel of Homestuck if you would still want to 
read it: http://www.mspaintadventures.com/?s=6


If you do start reading it and get into it, PLEASE, for the love of all 
that is good in this messed up world, DO NOT SKIP ANY ACTS OR PANELS. I'm 
not just saying this because it is generally good, but if you skip over 
even a single line you will regret it in the later panels as everything 
holds useful information to the story line. Enjoy! (:
comments.author: xXMageOfBreathXx

comments.text:
+xXMageOfBreathXx Hi, I keep seeing stuff about Homestuck- what actually is 
it?
